version_description:
-Bite is now usable in PvP
-Full HP on levelup
-Minor bug fixes

Reduced app size
Balancing
Lots of bug fixes
Stomt updated
Unstuck-button in settings
Level cap at 60

Flee mechanic (%-based)
Daemon Call boosted (for hunting Brutals)
Respeccing!
Master of the Hunt questline properly finished
Balancing (shields and abilities)
Developer news in-game
Bug fixes

-All players get a 3X HP buff in PvP
-New potion!
-New Brutal (interactable)
-New itembonus: Spell Damage
-Level cap raised to 65
-Ability balancing
-Improvements to Bleed and Poison
-Combo and phased attacks are now dodge/blockable

- Fixed app freeze in Easthaven
- Fixed main questline critical bug
- Several bugfixes
- Rebalancing of XP-requirement level 60+
- Support Vampire's Fall!

-Daily Brutals
-Minimap and tracking
-Revamped controls
-UI changes
-Bug fixes

-Cloud Saves
-Cosmetics
-Balancing
-Bug fixes

-Resiliance stat for PvP
-Balancing
-Reset Brutals mechanic
-Bug fixes
-Ads are removed

-Resiliance stat for PvP

-Reset Brutals mechanic
-Bug fixes
-Ads are removed
-Potential crash fix for some devices

-Shapeshifting
-Italian translation
-German expansion translation
-Lots of bug fixes

HUGE EXPANSION UPDATE
-New land: Denumald
-New quests
-New enemies
-New items
-New everything!

- NG+
- Stun in PvP now reduces focus instead of properly stunning in combo turns
- Item Augmentation
- Raised level cap to 75
- Ability to remove bloodstones from items
- Creature Lure potions available in stores
- Removed Armor Cap

-Spanish language added (thanks José Navarro and Vicente Wang)
-Vampiric Touch fixes
-HP-gain from Quality slightly nerfed
-God of Brutal Cape fixed
-Some PvP errors fixed (thanks to Discord guys for testing)

-level cap increased to 70
-balancing
-bug fixes
-Possible crash fix for some devices

-Bloodstones and gear upgrading
-Several new skills
-Faster loading times

-Full translations added (not just dialogues)
-8 new languages added
-English text corrected
-UI-improvements
-UI-effects

-Bug fixes
-Bug fixes

- Blood Moon Cycle
- Create a replay of your killing blow
- Malay and Czech (More languages are on the way!)

*Minor hotfix, big update still being worked on*
-Performance optimization so chat works again despite heavy load

*次要更新，重大更新仍在进行中*
- 现在可以登录苹果云服务
- 错误修复

1.6 -迄今最大规模的更新
-地下城(包括特殊事件地下城和无限地下城)
-PvP季节(每个季节在血月结束时结束)
-新的高级技能树，包含25项新技能
-添加了器械包项目
-大量用户界面和特效增效
-新语言:匈牙利语和罗马尼亚语

1.6 -迄今最大规模的更新
-地下城(包括特殊事件地下城和无限地下城)
-PvP季节(每个季节在血月结束时结束)

-大量用户界面和特效增效
-新语言:匈牙利语和罗马尼亚语

-Arabic language support
-Greek language support
-Bug fixes
Hotfix for the dreaded stuck-in-dungeon bug.

- 成员（宠物）
- Bug修复
- 巢穴中有更多空间
- 仅可以选择传奇点数
- Niwokee可以快速旅行
- 减少制作旅行药水的时间
- 重新平衡获得经验值的无限地牢
- 集重新平衡
- 重新平衡了60级的经验值要求
